smsListingRequestsPendingEmpty.message: You haven't received any requests from your client yet

smsListingRequestsCompletedEmpty.headline: You don't have sender ID yet with complete status
smsListingRequestsCompletedEmpty.message: Check the request you have received on pending list to complete them

adminSmsSendersViewEmpty.headline: You don't have sender ID yet

smsListingRequestCreatePreview.message: Are you sure you want to add this Sender request?

listingRequestApprove.title: Approve Request
listingRequestApprove.message: Are you sure you want to approve the sender {{name}} request for the target country {{country}}?

listingRequestReject.title: Reject Request
listingRequestReject.message: Are you sure you want to reject the sender {{sender}} request for the target country {{country}}?

listingRequestRejectAndBlock.title: Reject & Block Request
listingRequestRejectAndBlock.message: Are you sure you want to reject & Block the sender {{sender}} request for the target country {{country}}?

smsListingBlock.title: Block Sender Listing
smsListingBlock.message: Are you sure you wish to block this sender for {{company}} towards {{country}}? The client will be unable to send messages through this sender to the chosen country and it will appear as Blocked at the clients list end.

smsListingSuspend.title: Suspend Sender
smsListingSuspend.message: Are you sure you wish to Suspend this sender for {{Lebanon}}? The client using it will be unable to send messages through this sender to the chosen country.

smsListingActivate.title: Activate Sender
smsListingActivate.message: Are you sure you wish to approve this sender for {{country}}? The company with access will be able to send messages through this sender to the chosen country.

smsOptInSender.title: Opt-in Phone Number
smsOptInSender.message: Are you sure you want to opt-in this phone number?

importOptedOutSmsSenders.title: Import
importOptedOutSmsSenders.label: Import file
importOptedOutSmsSenders.tooltip: Make sure the file includes only one column in valid phone number format
importOptedOutSmsSenders.validationMessage: Size less than 50 MB for CSV, and 30 MB for XLX

errors.file-too-large: File is too large, and exceeds the limit: 50MB for csv / 30MB for excel
errors.file-invalid-type: Invalid file upload. Your uploaded file should be of type: csv or excel.
